channel.title: Serp or BCEL?
channel.description:
Ive recently been looking into renaming in bytecode and all of the other sort of cool things you can do with it, and Ive found Serp and BCEL can both do this, could somone who knows what they are talking about inform me on what would be better to use? or the strengths or weaknesses of one compared to the other? or even which one is easier to work with?
thanks for the help :D

item.title: Serp or BCEL?
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

eXemplar:

Nothing, almost literally, except wow =).

Reason for my asking is I just started playing with the rsc client again recently, and I remembered you posted something where there was a pile of unicorns in the screen or something. I have no idea why I remember that =p.

Hey, I'm definitely further than that now but sadly still nowhere near playable. RLN is probably further than me with RSC.

Read full topic

item.title: Serp or BCEL?
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

Decently, I suppose. Sort of lost interest for a while, but I've started looking at the RSC client again so maybe I'll pick up my server again. The insane object placement system is discouraging though (I'd like to think that I simply misunderstood it when I tried to figure it out earlier).

What have you been up to since Aryan?

Read full topic

item.title: Serp or BCEL?
item.dc:creator: @eXemplar eXemplar
item.description:
@eXemplar wrote:

Hi Krichevskoy, how'd the rsc server go ? =p

item.title: Serp or BCEL?
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

eXemplar:

Serp hasn't been touched in years, and BCEL is so bad they tell you to use asm =)

Haven't seen you around in a while
I greatly dislike using ASM for manipulating existing classes, though it's wonderful for generating them.

Read full topic

item.title: Serp or BCEL?
item.dc:creator: @eXemplar eXemplar
item.description:

item.title: Serp or BCEL?
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

BCEL definitely.
SERP has a rather promising Project structure though - eventually it will propagate changes made in one project element throughout the entire group, which would greatly simplify renaming. At least, I remember reading that somewhere on the SERP pages.

Read full topic

item.title: Serp or BCEL?
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

BCEL. Bcel's so good that Java's own "reflection" uses it.

Nifty huh?

Read full topic
